en-EN.article: Iâ€™m Åerife. Thank you for visiting! After gaining experience in tourism and hospitality, I have shifted my career towards Front-End development. As a developer creating user-focused applications with modern technologies, I continue to learn and build innovative solutions.
en-EN.communication: You can contact me through my profiles above

info.name: Education
info.value: Antalya Bilim University, Tourism and Hotel Management (100% English), Bachelor's, 2018

en-EN.about: After a professional career in tourism and hotel management, I turned my passion for technology into a focus on Front-End development. I create user-centric and interactive web applications using modern technologies like React, Redux, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript.My internship in digital marketing at Rixos Hotels Dubai, along with my experience in human resources and as a Public Relations Specialist at the Turkish Green Crescent, has equipped me with strong communication and problem-solving skills across various disciplines. Additionally, my e-commerce experience on platforms like Amazon and Etsy has allowed me to actively engage in the online business world.
en-EN.about2: I am always open to learning and innovation. My goal is to combine my experiences with modern software technologies to create creative and effective solutions.

projects.name: Witflix - Netflix Clone
projects.description: The static design of Netflixâ€™s profile selection, homepage, and design elements using HTML and CSS.

projects.name: CV Project
projects.description: It was developed dynamically and component-based with React. Data operations were handled using Axios, and the design was created in Figma.

projects.name: Pizza Order Website
projects.description: A dynamic order page created for a pizza company. It is built with React and Axios to handle POST requests. It is a single-page application consisting of 3 components. Form validation checks the input before posting the data.
